meanings.definition: Buildings or group of buildings where goods are manufactured or assembled.
meanings.sent1: The factories in our town produce cars and clothes.
meanings.sent2: We visited the factories to see how toys are made.
meanings.sent3: The factories were so busy that the workers danced while working.
meanings.sent4: The factories hummed with activity, like a beehive.
meanings.sent5: The smokestacks of the factories painted the sky with gray clouds.

meanings.definition: A place where something is made or constructed.
meanings.sent1: Factories are where furniture and electronics are created.
meanings.sent2: The old factory was turned into a trendy art studio.
meanings.sent3: The factories seemed to have a secret dance party every night.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a factory of creative ideas, constantly producing new concepts.
meanings.sent5: The factory of dreams worked tirelessly to bring fantasies to life.
